videos.title: Introduction to the Federal Integrated Business Framework (FIBF): Functions, Activities, and Business Capabilities
videos.description: Enhance your agency's services by utilizing the Federal Integrated Business Framework. Learn about the Functions, Activities, and Business Capabilities components of the FIBF and how they help document agencies’ common business processes.

videos.title: FIBF: How to Use the Functions, Activities, and Business Capabilities
videos.description: Learn how to use the FIBF Functions, Activities, and Business Capabilities to help find a solution or service to fit your agency’s needs.

videos.title: FIBF: Introduction to Business Use Cases
videos.description: FIBF Business Use Cases are a set of agency “stories” that document the key activities, inputs, outputs, and other functional area intersections to describe how the Federal government operates. Learn how agencies, QSMOs, and service providers use the Business Use Cases to evaluate vendor solutions.

videos.image_alt: BIBF Business Stadard Data Element Image
videos.title: FIBF: Introduction to Standard Data Elements
videos.description: FIBF Standard Data Elements identify and describe the business information essential to performing Federal Government services. Learn how QSMOs and service providers use the standard data elements to exchange information.

videos.title: What Are Shared Services
videos.description: Learn how Shared Services can help agencies solve the challenges of outdated technology, redundant process, and constrained resources such as money and time.

videos.image_alt: QSMOs and the Trail to Mission Success image
videos.title: QSMOs and the Trail to Mission Success
videos.description: Learn about Quality Service Management Offices and how they advance agency decision making in selecting the right solutions and tools to support their mission.

videos.image_alt: Enhancing Your Agencies Services by Utilizing FIBF image
videos.title: Enhancing Your Agencies Services by Utilizing FIBF
videos.description: Enhance your agency's services by utilizing the Federal Integrated Business Framework. Learn how the FIBF facilitates procurement requirements, translates policy into practices and supports agency modernization planning.

videos.image_alt: M3 Framework - Move Your Agency Forward with M3 image
videos.title: M3 Framework - Move Your Agency Forward with M3
videos.description: Looking to modernize a system or mission support services? The M3 Framework can help. The GSA Office of Shared Solutions and Performance Improvement (OSSPI) worked with experts across government to create the M3 Framework - which lists best practices and activities critical to modernization success.  It reduces risk and implementation time, gain efficiences and deliver results in agency modernization efforts.

videos.image_alt: M3 Playbook - Move Your Agency Forward with M3 image
videos.title: M3 Playbook - Move Your Agency Forward with M3
videos.description: M3 Playbook provides a comprehensive set of tools and templates. Developed in coordination with Federal agencies, Providers, and Industry the playbook includes more than 70 step-by-step guided activities.

videos.image_alt: Modernization Phases - Move Your Agency Forward with M3 image
videos.title: Modernization Phases - Move Your Agency Forward with M3
videos.description: Learn about the phases of the M3 Playbook - Assessment, Readiness, Selection, Engagement, Migration, and Operations on the journey to modernizing your agency's mission support platform. It's a how to guide to delivering on your promise of agency modernization.
